alert.note: Alert for Cottonwood; Jackson; Lincoln; Lyon; Murray; Nobles; Pipestone; Rock (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 01 at 2:42PM CST until December 03 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM CST THIS AFTERNOON... ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM FRIDAY TO MIDNIGHT CST FRIDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...For the first Wind Advisory, south winds 20 to 25 mph with gusts up to 40 mph. For the second Wind Advisory, northwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Lincoln, Lyon, Murray, Cottonwood, Nobles, Jackson, Pipestone and Rock Counties. * WHEN...For the first Wind Advisory, until 4 PM CST this afternoon. For the second Wind Advisory, from 3 PM Friday to midnight CST Friday night. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Gusty winds coupled with falling snow Friday may result in periods of reduced visibility.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Cottonwood; Jackson; Lincoln; Lyon; Murray; Nobles; Pipestone; Rock
